title: Greta Van Susteren - Wikipedia
snippet: Greta Conway Van Susteren (born June 11, 1954) is an American journalist, lawyer, and television news anchor for Newsmax TV. She was previously on CNN, Fox News, and MSNBC. She hosted Fox News's On the Record w/ Greta Van Susteren for 14 years (2002–2016) before departing for MSNBC, where ...

title: Greta Van Susteren | C-SPAN.org
snippet: Greta Conway Van Susteren is an American commentator, lawyer, and former television news anchor for CNN, Fox News, and NBC News. She hosted Fox News's On the Record w/ Greta Van Susteren for 14 years before departing for MSNBC, where she hosted For the Record with Greta for roughly six months ...
